translations: n．泥潭，泥坑：动物（尤指猪）在泥中打滚的地方。
· The pigs were rolling in the wallows.
v．打滚，翻滚：在泥、水或雪中打滚，通常表示享受或为了清洁。
· The dog wallows in the mud.

sentences.sentence: When the wallows have gone, there is still time of return;
sentences.translation: 燕子去了，有再来的时分；

sentences.sentence: Susan said she wouldn't marry a man unless he wallows in money.
sentences.translation: 苏珊说过，不是腰缠万贯的男人她就不嫁。
